name: SAST (Shtity Alien Shooty Thing)
description:
This is my first game that I decided to try and publish. It is not very good but I intend to keep making better projects. This is a 2D platformer arcade game where you shoot aliens. Not very complex, but I had a good time making it.

To anyone interested:
If you have anything you'd like to change about this, be it art or gameplay tweaks, I would love it if you contacted me. I can share the game files with you and will publish any changes made to this game.
